chunk_text: Begin your journey by exploring two of the region's finest wineries, and conclude at the stunning West Hills Vineyards tasting room for a complimentary tasting, gourmet bites, Bocce Ball, putt-putt golf, and live music from 5-7 PM. Whether you're a seasoned wine enthusiast or a casual sipper, our Joinable Tour is designed to provide a fun and relaxing experience. Gather your friends or make new ones as you savor the best wines our region has to offer.
